pullrequest.title: Check cmake version before calling target_link_options

content.raw:
I think `target_compile_options` is the one that's really necessary. The error message noted in pr #677 was a compilation error not a linking error:

~~~
src/parser_urdf.cc:30:10: fatal error: 'urdf_model/model.h' file not found
#include <urdf_model/model.h>
         ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1 error generated.
~~~

I think `target_link_options` is probably only needed in edge cases where you have one of the dependencies installed to a different non-standard prefix, but I included it originally for symmetry.

Let me know if you think it should be removed.
